Dear Sirs,

It was February when we first heard from Mr. Smith. He had just returned from his trip to New Orleans. We were very pleased to hear about his success.

He brought back a lot of new ideas and plans for our company. We are excited to see how these will benefit us.

Thank you for your continued support.

Sincerely,
[Signature]
